attributes.action: A knighthood for captain Tom Moore for his fundraising for NHS
attributes.additional_details: So he can receive a knighthood before his hundredth birthday
attributes.background: Give a knighthood for raising over 10 million pound aged 99 years old

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
